attributes.action: Give dentist more nhs space across the country parliament don’t give enough
attributes.additional_details: Because there are not enough space and it is you job to sort the nhs out for the better
attributes.background: Give the nhs more dental practice more space for nhs patients as it is impossible to get on I have been trying for three years

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
